thread.title: Record rainfall wreaking havoc on flight schedules at TIA
thread.title_full: Record rainfall wreaking havoc on flight schedules at TIA

author: Ashley Gurbal Kritzer
title: Record rainfall wreaking havoc on flight schedules at TIA
text:
Record rainfall wreaking havoc on flight schedules at TIA Aug 3, 2015, 10:04am EDT Industries & Tags Ashley Gurbal Kritzer Reporter Tampa Bay Business Journal Related Content Courtesy of Tampa International Airport Tampa International Airport welcome sign Business travelers headed out of Tampa International Airport on Monday may encounter delays due to the record-setting rainfall. TIA spokeswoman Janet Zink said Monday morning that "about 38 departures" had been delayed, and about a dozen arriving flights had been diverted to other airports. There will be "periodic arrivals" over the next few hours as there's a lull in the rain, Zink said. Check with your airline or visit TIA's website to check your flight status .
